They didn't have to, because the officer did that for them.
Leaving and coming back later is generally a poor option if you actually have a busy schedule. As one who works long hours and is not inclined to take more time Off just to deal with the DMV, I would prefer to get there early so I can get a Spot closer to the front of the line so that my turnaround time is much shorter, allowing me more time to get to work. The reasons for waiting on line take precedence over Mackey's insistence on trying to "save" people spiritually.Â
